pain_points_original.title: Adherence to PROTECTED-Level Security & Sovereignty
pain_points_original.description: AGS must implement AI tools that meet stringent Australian government security standards (IRAP PROTECTED, Essential Eight) and data sovereignty rules. This is non-negotiable for protecting sensitive state legal information, where a breach poses a catastrophic risk to national security and public trust.

pain_points_original.title: Lawyer Productivity Drag on Core Legal Tasks
pain_points_original.description: AGS's 570 lawyers are burdened by time-intensive, manual tasks like document summarisation, discovery review, and initial drafting. This inefficiency limits capacity and service delivery speed. AI is sought to automate these workflows, freeing up valuable expert time for high-value strategic work.

pain_points_original.title: Mandate for Explainable & Ethically Sound AI
pain_points_original.description: AGS requires any AI solution to be transparent and explainable, allowing lawyers to understand and justify its outputs. Using 'black box' AI is a critical risk in a legal context where advice must be defensible. This is a fundamental requirement for professional accountability and ethical practice.

pain_points_original.title: Need for Future-Proof, Advanced 'Agentic' AI
pain_points_original.description: AGS seeks to move beyond standard generative AI to invest in 'agentic AI' capable of autonomous, multi-step task execution. This reflects a strategic goal to adopt next-generation technology for a long-term capability advantage, rather than simply solving current productivity issues with today's tech.

pain_points_original.title: Risk of Disrupting Deeply Embedded Workflows
pain_points_original.description: Any new AI solution must integrate seamlessly with existing core systems like iManage Cloud, Elite 3E, and MS Office. Failure to do so would disrupt established workflows for 800 staff, creating data silos and significant adoption barriers, thereby negating any potential productivity gains.

merge_decisions.merged: Mandate for Explainable & Ethically Sound AI
Risk of Disrupting Deeply Embedded Workflows
